xml.data:
Home » 33Y3 Āyatanayamakapāḷi » 2 Pavattivāra » 2.3 Uppādanirodhavāra » 2.3.3 Anāgatavāra
2.3.3.6 Paccanīkapuggalokāsa
Pavattivāra
Uppādanirodhavāra
Anāgatavāra
Paccanīkapuggalokāsa
225.
1743»  Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1744Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati sotāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1745«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā.
1746»  Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1747Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1748«  Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti?
1749Rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati. Kāmāvacare parinibbantānaṃ rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
1750»  Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1751Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1752«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā.
1753»  Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1754Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1755«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā.
1756»  Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1757Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjissati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1758«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā. (Cakkhāyatanamūlakaṃ.)
226.
1759»  Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1760Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1761«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā.
1762»  Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1763Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjissati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1764«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā.
1765»  Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1766Pacchimabhavikānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjissati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1767«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā. (Ghānāyatanamūlakaṃ.)
227.
1768»  Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1769Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1770«  Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti?
1771Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
1772»  Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1773Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1774«  Yassa vā pana yattha…pe… ? Āmantā. (Rūpāyatanamūlakaṃ.)
228.
1775»  Yassa yattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1776Pacchimabhavikānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1777«  Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
